r4 Family Instance Types Deprecation Information

The r4 family is a family of instance types.
The r4 family of instance types is deprecated.
The r4 family was offered when Neptune was launched in 2018.
Newer instance types offer much better price/performance than the r4 family.
As of engine version 1.1.0.0, Neptune no longer supports r4 instance types.
Neptune was launched in 2018.
Neptune is a service that supports various instance types.
